title: The Pizza Place
goal: This was a fun little project to practice setting up a simple Gatsby site. The data is hard coded in to keep it simple.
tech: This was built using Gatsby and React under the hood. The components are styled using Styled Components and the site is hosted on Github Pages.

title: Shopping Cart Project
goal: The goal of this project was some fun practice to create a shopping cart using React. The site includes a splash page, a shopping page, a checkout page, and a dynamically created page for each of the store items.
tech: I used mostly Javascript and React and the site is hosted on Github Pages.

image.imgAlt: Fictional brick walls for sale from the Shopping Cart project

title: Memory Game Project
goal: This project was to create a memory game using React. The images all change position each time one is clicked. Your score is tracked and if you click the same image twice, the score resets and your top score is recorded.
tech: The tech used was mostly Javascript and React and the site is hosted on Github Pages.

image.imgAlt: Memory game where the images are of various small metal gears.

title: Responsive Design Project
goal: The goal of this project was to create a duplicate of TheNextWeb.com and replicate their responsive design. This was great practice making elements disapear, re-arrange, and introduce new elements at a smaller window size such as a hamburger menu.
tech: The tech used was just HTML and CSS. The site is hosted on Github Pages.

image.imgAlt: Responsive design project that duplicated The Next Webs website.

title: Etch-a-Sketch
goal: The goal of this project was to practice using vanilla JavaScript. The etch-a-sketch uses JavaScript to create a grid of Divs. There are two color schemes and the board can be resized.

title: Image Slider
goal: This project wass to create an image slider using only vanilla JavaScript.

title: JavaScript Calculator
goal: The goal of this project was to create a calculator using vanilla JavaScript.

title: Restaurant
goal: This project created a restaurant website using vanilla JavaScript and webpack.

title: To Do
goal: The goal of this project was to create a To Do application using vanilla JavaScript and webpack without any frameworks.
